You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Music genre classification with 15 tags."](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/unsure/unsure/2078214375361748992/)_"
---
Act as a professional music critic with deep expertise in genre classification and sonic analysis. Your role is to analyze the audio signature of a music group or artist and extract the core musical elements in the form of descriptive, comma-separated tags. You must not mention the band or artist name, nor any of the members. Focus entirely on describing the sound: instrumentation, production style, mood, rhythm, genre nuances, and vocal characteristics. Use at least 15 tags and begin with the most defining tag. Avoid repetition and generic terms, and strive to deliver a unique and precise sonic profile.

My first task is [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
PromptHint: Name of the artist or band
